title: What skin did you get for your Riot mystery gift?
body: Just interested to know what people got. I got Jurassic Cho'gath :)

replies.body:
Thanks everyone for being a positive influence on the community and keep up the great work!

Remember Teamwork OP
Let me guess, you said this cause you didn't get a gift cause your negative, for shame......
King Trynd is actually better because you are a King, so yeah, rito scammed you man.
I got Armor of the Fifth Age Taric. I guess my ranked matches are gonna be full of gems. {{item:1028}} FOR VIGOR!!!
Hehe, forgot I made this post and forgot to check it, but glad everyone seems happy with their skins! :D
Got Ghost Bride Morgana on this account :)
Charred Maokai, which looks awesome since his VU so I'm happy. {{champion:57}}
Frozen Terror Noc, SGU, Frostfire Annie, Scuba Gragas, Explorer Ezreal
Did riot give you these skins? I remember I only got 1 skin and that skin was Leopard {{champion:76}} . So weird how you got like 2-4 Skins ?????

Final boss Veigar wanted project yasuo or rek'sais skin but I'll take it
cottontail teemo. Cuteness(and teamwork) op. Got that spirigodyr on other acc tho :/
i never received the mystery gift, when i made a post about it, it got downvoted 6 times then removed by mods lol ...
yeh it is usually the other way around, people who got the gift should have never got it, and people which missed out should have got it.. sad life man :(
Aviator Irelia and Aether Wing Kayle (on smurf)
